1/* $NetBSD: getsumd.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:36 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*

7 *
8 * Id: getsumd.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:38 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10
11#include "ipf.h"
12
13char *getsumd(sum)
14 u_32_t sum;
15{
16 static char sumdbuf[17];
17
18 if (sum & NAT_HW_CKSUM)
19 sprintf(sumdbuf, "hw(%#0x)", sum & 0xffff);
20 else
21 sprintf(sumdbuf, "%#0x", sum);
22 return sumdbuf;
23}
24
